item.title: About
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: I’ve been a programmer since 2008, primarily in web development. Some of the languages I’ve used are GO, JavaScript/Node, Java, C#, Visual Basic, PHP among others. I really enjoy learning new things and being informed about what’s new. In my current Job I work as a DevOps/Infrastructure Engineer, even a really enjoy front end development and I do a lot of front end in my spare time. In this blog I will write about anything in my daily living.
